page.title: 14HOME FARM
page.content: There are eleven farms in our area. Here are the names of a few of them. White House Farm,Syke House Farm, Brecks Farm,Verity's Farm and Home Farm.Home Farm is next to Swillington Park.It grows wheat,barley,oil seed rape and turnips.Home Farm has four farm labourers.They have a gun shop which sells bullets,pellets and guns. The gun shop has been open for two years.Mrs Chapman, who owns Home Farm has lived there for ten years four months.She owns seventy six acres altogether.On Home Farm there are ducks,geese,horses,cows,dogs,cats and bulls.Mrs Chapman has to borrow machinery from other farmers. They also have kennels and a cattery. Home Farm was the main farm on the large estate owned by the Lowther family of Swillington Hall.
